src/DessertTable.jsx.content:
import React from 'react'; import { Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell } from '@react-md/table'; import { CrossFade } from '@react-md/transition'; const DessertTable = ({ dessert }) => { if (!dessert) { return null; } const { name, type, calories, fat, carbs, protein, sodium, calcium, iron, } = dessert; return ( Name {name} Type {type} Calories {calories} Fat {fat} Carbs {carbs} Protein {protein} Calcium {calcium} Iron {iron} Sodium {sodium}
); }; export default DessertTable;
